title: Spider
description: A disgraced officer. An isolated station. A fleet of ruthless pirates.With his career in tatters, former Royal Navy Commander Kitt Ashton finds himself banished to the failing relay hub known as Spider for the duration of his term of service. Now he spends his days listening to messages from Mars and wondering whether saving the Admiral’s wife was a mistake after all.But Ashton has no intention of staying on Spider for any longer than it takes to contact a group of pirates known as Rippers, meet up with their leader and sell what he knows. It may the only way he can get what he really wants – a ship of his own. And after that? Who knows what might happen. A very British space adventure!
author: Leona Grace
